parameters.name: AllocationStatus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether instances can be deployed on the host. Valid values:

*   **0**: Instances cannot be deployed on the host.
*   **1**: Instances can be deployed on the host.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostGroupId
parameters.description: The dedicated cluster ID. You can call the DescribeDedicatedHostGroups operation to query the dedicated cluster ID.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostId
parameters.description: The ID of the host in the dedicated cluster.

parameters.name: HostStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the host. Valid values:

*   **0**: creating
*   **1**: running
*   **2**: faulty
*   **3**: being replaced
*   **4**: deprecated
*   **5**: deleting
*   **6**: restarting

parameters.name: HostType
parameters.description:
The storage type of the host. Valid values:

*   **dhg_cloud_ssd**: enhanced SSD (ESSD)
*   **dhg_local_ssd**: local SSD

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
